name: Rug Cleaning Simulator
description: Rug cleaning simulator is cozy, relaxing first person simulator about running small rug cleaning business. You start as a burned out person that leaves corporate job and open rug cleaning business.

name: Galandrix
description: Galandrix is an arcade game played from a top-down view and features both fast-paced action and real time strategic choices. Select your ship and blast off into the unknown against countless hordes of enemies.

name: Leafblade
description: The coziest mix of ARPG and monster tamer. Fight along the Mons you meet in your adventure to recover the bond between humans and Mons. Take care of your Mons in your farm, improving their combat and farm skills while ensuring their happiness.

name: Datavoid: Catrow
description: Catrow is an action-platform game with an ambiguous design. The world, once as cute as it used to be, has been corrupted by Idito's intrusion into the files. And remember, this game is not about ponies!

name: Tennis Manager 2024
description: The courts have missed you, it’s time to sign your comeback and prove yourself as the greatest tennis manager. Tennis Manager 2024 is back and better than ever! Get ready to strategize, train your new wonderkids, and conquer the courts in the most immersive tennis management experience yet!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Cyberjunkie: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Sand Nomads
description: Sand Nomads is an open world tactical RPG where you lead a team of nomads looking for riches and fame across a massive futuristic sand planet. Explore the world, recruit companions, chase rewards and unravel the mysteries of ancient alien ruins!

name: Rapid Fury
description: In Rapid Fury (FPS) you blast the monsters and bosses with a shotgun across four arenas. Choose 20 waves of monsters or endless wave. Level up your skills after each wave. Electronic music helps you maintain your firing rhythm. Master the game and climb the leaderboard to the top. Have a blast!

name: Death Horizon: Cyberfusion
description: Roguelike, physics-based, full-body FPS with cybernetic implants and procedurally generated levels. Enhance your abilities with a variety of cyber implants, experience physics-based interactions, play uniquely generated game levels, upgrade any weapon at your disposal.

name: Climbing In Barrel With Double-Barrel
description: This is a challenging game about climbing in barrel with double-barrel.

name: Urban Nightmare
description: Urban Nightmare is a Found Footage like First-Person Parkour game where you are trying to escape a carnivorous city that is trying to kill you.

name: JudgeSim
description: Things were worse than ever in Banana Republic, a somber island country. While anarchists on streets; corruption was getting deeper with economic crisis and rising crime rates. All burdens were up to "Judges" whom trying to make things right with honesty...

name: The Violinist
description: If you love the violin, classical music, or any instrument, this vertical rhythm game is for you.Rosin up your bow, tune your violin, and launch yourself into musical success.

name: Island Party Chaos
description: Island Party Chaos: Dive into a hilarious multiplayer adventure! Navigate whimsical obstacles, conquer wild challenges, and outsmart rivals in the race to be the ultimate party champion. Get ready for laughter, strategy, and unpredictable mayhem – let the chaos begin!

name: Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton’s Journey
description: "Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton's Journey" is a historical fantasy RPG set in the Wild West. Play as Jake, a cowboy uncovering secrets and exploring towns. Your choices shape Jake's destiny through quests and tough decisions. Experience compelling and fun stories for a memorable experience.

name: Cube Hero
description: Cube Hero is a simple puzzle roguelike deckbuilding game. Build your own powerful deck and defeat your enemies! There are always new enemies, cubes, treasures, and events waiting for you!

name: Lost in the Roots
description: A 2D adventure with a twisted story about guilt, where a girl is kidnapped and held in an attic somewhere in the countryside. Why and who took the girl to this godforsaken place? What to do when there is nowhere to run?

name: Great Feats of Ancient Russ
description: "Great Feats of Ancient Rus: Defenders of the Homeland" is an exciting real-time strategy game where you'll immerse yourself in the atmosphere of ancient Russian mythology and become the leader of a thriving settlement constantly under threat from lizardmen attacks.

name: Blood Reaver
description: Blood Reaver is a dark fantasy, online, wave-based, FPS where 4 unlikely heroes must restore an ancient order, harnessing the powers of blood magic to stop a demonic invasion sent by the gods of hell - reigniting a timeless war where the fate of their world hangs in the balance.

name: Moon Samurai
description: Moon Samurai is an intense, engaging action adventure that slips players into the high tops of a young warrior on a mission to defeat a corrupted government in the dangerous lunar city-state of RAM City.

name: Cyber Seekers: Conquest
description: Shoot, strike and hack machines in a rogue lite sci-fi adventure. Slot new abilities and upgrades in each run and become a superior Cyber Seeker.

name: Star Fetchers: Escape from Pork Belly
description: A action filled rouglite boxing game where you'll punch and claw yourself out of the fighting ring "Pork Belly", an illegal gladiator arena hidden in the outskirt of the Gray Zone.

name: Publish or Perish
description: Publish or Perish is a game that simulates working in academia. In order to keep your job, you must publish scientific work. Reviewers are here to get you and all you can do is try to survive. Can you publish enough papers to enjoy tenure? (Contains practical advice for academics)

name: Prism Indigo DX
description: Fight your friends to save your friends in Prism Indigo, a vicious retro-styled bullet hell shooter starring a rookie magical girl.

name: Hexton
description: Explore, build, harvest. Hexton is a relaxing building game where you try to create the largest city possible. Looking for a light challenge? This game's for you!

name: Legends of Aria: Classic
description: Legends of Aria Classic: Rediscover the thrill of MMORPG adventure with reverted ruleset to 2019, including the Karma System and original protected areas. Forge your legacy in a player-driven world of endless possibilities. Join us on a nostalgic journey into classic MMORPG gaming!

name: Singularity Survivors
description: Singularity Survivors throws you into the heart of a post-apocalyptic realm where the very essence of survival is put to the test in a vast, open-world environment. A game that demands wit, will, and strategy, you’re not just fighting to live — you’re crafting a new world from the ashes of the old.

name: Astral Outcast
description: You've become a spaceship captain who transports supplies to Earth's colony on Mars. On a return trip your ship gets lost on the way back to Earth. Can you find out how to survive in space and get back home?

name: S.X.E. Slider
description: A space-themed sliding tile puzzle game featuring 25 gorgeous images with a sci-fi theme.

name: Panels
description: Puzzle platformer with a dash of metroidvania and a unique panel switching mechanic.

name: Survival: Fountain of Youth - Sea Wolf Pack
description: Customize your home with a set of nautical decorative items

name: SMYS: Costumes
description: Customize your zglubs with 100+ items to mix together.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Ana Outfit Pack 2
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Ana.

name: SMYS: Classic - Costumes
description: Customize your zglubs with 100+ items to mix together.

name: Quatro!: Eclipse DLC
description: Space out with the Quatro! Eclipse DLC!

name: Sleeping With Sakuya Izayoi: ASMR DLC
description: Enjoy this short fully voiced scene that brings the Sleeping With Sakuya Izayoi experience to life through the use of immersive ASMR!

name: Let's Puzzle: Celestial Wonders Pack
description: Dive into the Celestial Wonders DLC for Let's Puzzle, transforming your game with exquisite space-inspired puzzles and cosmic aesthetics. Activate dynamic elements at will, curate your celestial menu backgrounds, space cursors, and orchestrate your adventure with an array of galactic tunes.

name: Poor Thief
description: We're guiding a thief to steal diamonds on the ground, earning points as we steal diamonds, but constantly being chased by the police.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Tabletop Terror
description: 1 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Classic Tabletop Board Game themed ultra-wide table with multiple playfields!

name: Train Sim World 4: Semmeringbahn - Wiener Neustadt - Mürzzuschlag Route
description: Explore the World's first true mountain railway in Train Sim World 4! Work winding trains at altitude through the rocky, forested peaks of the Austrian Alps. Climb the Semmering Pass before hastening downgrade towards historic Wiener Neustadt.

name: Hodgepodge Hunch: Premium Pack - Sakura
description: Hodgepodge Hunch DLC includes numerous new playable characters and item archetypes. Once purchased, these characters will be unlocked and new ingredients and Relics will start to appear in Multiplayer and Ghost matches.

name: Only Up: Tiny
description: Only Up: Tiny Is a First-Person Precision Platformer, Your goal is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult jumps.

name: Demon Save the World
description: "Demon Save the World" is an action rogue game where you play as a gangster to save the world.

name: Break It!
description: BREAK IT to BREAK OUT. A 2D arcade-like game inspired by the classic game Brick Breaker

name: Avians Against Aviation
description: Play as a bird flying against a hoard of airplanes and other flying machines or creatures in this cartoon themed side-scroller. Eat mosquitos and fight a series of nasty aviators who think the sky is theirs to control. It's either you, or them.

name: Bedrotting
description: This game is about bed rotting. You lie in the bed for 20 days trying to survive.

name: Truck
description: Survive endless hordes of zombies by driving over them and upgrading your truck with weapons. The only way out is to keep driving. Survive 30 minutes in each of the five maps, collect coins and unlock new trucks!

name: Memora Wanderer
description: Memora Wanderer is a cute nostalgic RPG in which you embark on an adventure in the lands of Memora. With an emphasis on world exploration, item gathering, freedom to level up where you want, and freedom to build your character's class, stats, and skills how you see fit.

name: Cynderfall Cycle
description: A 3d isometric roguelite game. Fight your way through the tower, discover the secrets of Cynderfall, upgrade your strength and use your abilities such as seamlessly switching between Melee and Magic to defeat the final boss.

name: Super Spy Academy
description: Join Leo in Super Spy Academy! Uncover a mysterious plot at a prestigious university, solve puzzles, interact with unique characters, and explore diverse areas to save the school from a perilous fate.

name: Gaia
description: A personal game about the maker's daughter with a link to our world's problems. Gaia is a story-driven platformer that takes the player through the world of Greek Mythology and leaves the player with the feeling that everyone can change the world for the better.

name: Slime Farm
description: Dive into Slime Farm Simulator, where you'll play with, and care for the Cutest magical slimes ever seen! Watch as they Evolve in whimsical ways, strategically manage their Elements and moods, and expand your enchantingly cute slime farm.

name: Sirocco
description: MOBA meets Vampire Survivors in a dynamic 5v5 arena inspired by the legendary Warcraft 3 mod: Battleships. Rally your team as you swap abilities mid-match, load up auto-firing weapons, and craft strategies on the fly in Sirocco. No rules — just fun.

name: Pocket Pusher: The Warehouse
description: A level for Pocket Pusher based on my experiences working in a Warehouse

name: Spatial
description:
Spatial is a 3D gaming hub where creators craft and share immersive social experiences for web, mobile, and VR. We're transforming online interaction from passive watching to active play. Think YouTube, but for games.

From Racing Empire to Merge Survivor Zombie, there are thousands of games that can be discovered on Spatial. And with the Spatial Creator Toolkit, developers can build and publish their own games to a community of millions of players, to the library of games is growing every day.

name: Cyber Sensation: Malware Breakout
description: Sin descripción

name: PolarDread
description:
PolarDread is a horror game inspired by games in the Sit And Survive Genre that takes the concept provided in the game and flips it on its head several times, throwing the trailer into tense situations where they will need to act on their feet to avoid bloodthirsty mascots in a winter-themed resort.

Hide under a desk from a massive mechanical bear, throw objects, or even the mascots themselves, close doors, vents, and keep your barring until the clock strikes six.

name: Fallen Kingdom: A Mario PC Port Retake
description: Sin descripción

name: Catch the Vandal
description: Catch the Vandal is an multiplayer game where players take on the roles of both police officers and vandals. Police officers must identify the vandals among the citizens, while the vandals try to disguise themselves and vandalize the city. Have fun competing to achieve objectives and win the game.

name: Zombie Battle
description: The doctors would like create new humans. Stronger, faster humans. But the humans will be zombies. The zombies killing the doctors! Your name is 'Joe'. You are Soldier. You travel the helicopter to Zombie Land, you must save the doctors and kill the zombies.

name: Infinicrypt
description: Take control of one of 3 mighty heroes to vanquish an evil as old as time. Dodge attacks, slay monsters, and collect items in this bullet-hell dungeon-delving roguelike! Are you ready for the infinite depths?

name: Shaqing
description: "Shaqing" is a Chinese horror puzzle game set in "Wuzhan Town". Players must help the protagonist escape an evil scene where dreams and reality blur, and save his beloved. The objective is to help the protagonist escape and save his beloved.

name: Dragon Ruins
description: A dungeon crawling microgame for tired people.

name: Lizards vs Slavs: Arena
description: The great Svyatoslav Igorevich was captured by the evil jackets, and now they force him to fight in the arena.

name: Defense of the Dauntless
description: Endless horde mode tower defense with permanent and per-run progression. Unlock dozens of towers, survive and become dauntless.

name: I Am Etheric
description: I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game in which a man with spiritual power visits a small, secluded psychiatric hospital in a town to banish an archon who can travel through different dimensions

name: Kane no naru Ki
description:
There is only one objective. Defeat the last boss in front of you.
This is a challenging work game centered on combat.
Character development, skill-based combat,
It is recommended for those who are looking for a challenging level of difficulty.

We do not recommend this game to those who are looking for scenario, story element, exploration and adventure element.

name: Three Verses
description: THREE VERSES is an adventure game / first person dungeoncrawler / typing game based on poetry. Having shed your corporeal form, you must now escape purgatory by completing the simple task of delivering verses from deities to struggling poets.

name: Pax Solis
description: Pax Solis is a mod for Europa Universalis IV which adds more content to the 1444 start date, especially East Asian content which is relatively neglected by the main game. The map and UI are also changed to an extent.

name: Haven: The Leader
description: Sin descripción

name: Atlas Novum
description: Atlas Novum is an overhaul mod for Europa Universalis IV which alters many aspects of the game: a massive map overhaul adding in 1000s of new provinces; the addition of 1000+ countries, over 1000 new cultures and a dozen new religions, including a minority system and culture families; a rework of development into wealth, infrastructure and population; 100 new trade goods with dynamic prices determined on supply and demand; and much more.

name: Shadow of Atlantis
description: Sin descripción

name: Surgical Strike
description: Enhanced port of Surgical Strike released only in Brazil for the Sega CD 32X (which means that it requires both the Sega CD and the 32X).

name: Kiss in Hell
description:
Steamy dreams that continue every night, and the dangerous yet tempting man who appears in them… Waking up from another unspeakable secret dream, with a flushed face, what unfolds is a weird mansion?!

Thrown amongst various demon lords each bubbling with desire, can you survive their world?

name: Deus Cult
description: Deus Cult is a tribute management game in a pre-apocalyptic world. Join humanity's last line of defense, and manage your resources carefully to please the Gods. Plan your strategy and offer Money, Faith or Blood as tribute, while the Gods unleash the plagues that will bring the end of time.

name: Mugogy Jump
description:
Meet the fun Mugogy monsters, who lived peacefully in the ocean, until the evil ZZ Corporation decided to invade their home! It's your turn to help them fight back!

Jump through 60 levels in four different worlds, using different Mugogy Monsters. Destroy enemies and orbs with 8 unique and crazy power-ups. Earn your reward! Collect as many coins as you can among the destruction you cause.

name: My Peterinary
description:
Time management in a veterinary clinic.

Hurry to heal all the pets! Cater to a variety of animals and discover them all. They need various treatments that will test your skill and speed.

name: Inspire
description: Inspire is a Stylized Top-Down Shooter set in the near future. Customize your arsenal, soar through the skies with your jetpack, and shoot your way through an alien invasion alongside your transformable backpack companion.

name: Moon River
description: Moon River is an atmospheric experience with very light narrative and gameplay elements. You'll explore different areas of Elapse Island, searching for ways to dispel dark shadows that block your path along the river. This is not intended to be thrilling or challenging, but rather to evoke emotions through the colors and sounds of this environment.

name: Slavic Gods Rodnoverie
description: Slash dungeon monsters, survive and protect shrine! Upgrade your God powers & support your champion!

name: Fenix
description:
The story is about Yaga's past, the past and story nobody tells about her and her desires.

Here you gonna help Yaga to get the magical artefact of Kuigorsj, leadead by the feather of a real Fenix.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Winds of Change
description: Winds of Change makes wide-ranging changes to twenty nations stretching from the Andean highlands to the vast steppes of Mongolia. There are many new branching missions, government reforms, events, estate privileges and more!

name: O.J.'s All-American Race to Acquittal
description: O.J.'s All-American Race to Acquittal is a parody Monopoly-styled shareware game for MS DOS that is based around the O.J. Simpson trial.

name: Mini Tennis Club
description: Step onto the tennis court as your cute and colorful character and get ready to showcase your tennis skills in exciting matches.

name: Paw Patrol
description: PAW Patrol is an arcade machine released by Arcade1Up as a part of their Arcade1Up Jr. line. The machine features 3 original games based on the PAW Patrol series.

name: Minecraft: Annoying Difficulty
description: Minecraft: Annoying Difficulty is a mod developed by Fundy which adds a new difficulty option that makes the game more annoying to play.

name: Daisy Chain
description: Daisy Chain is a queer, epistolary interactive fiction game, where the player reads diary entries, documents, and audio transcriptions by the scientist Benjamin Holloway and the perfect duplicate he created based on himself.

name: Flappy Bird
description: An unofficial Game Boy port of Flappy Bird.

name: Pirate Doom II
description: Pirate Doom II is a 32-level partial conversion for Doom II designed for MBF-compatible source ports, created by Darch.

name: Yars Rising
description:
From the renowned development studio WayForward Technologies, Inc. (Shantae, River City Girls, Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp) comes Yars Rising, a 2D action adventure exploration of one of Atari’s richest, and best known classic titles.

In WayForward’s experienced hands, the Yars franchise becomes an expansive mystery solved through 2D platforming action. Take control of the young hacker Emi Kimura, who is hired by a mysterious patron to infiltrate the shadowy QoTech corporation. Run, jump, sneak, and hack your way through challenges as you slowly unravel a complex secret shrouded in intrigue.

name: SteamWorld Heist II
description: Join Captain Leeway and his ragtag crew as they uncover the enigmatic menace threatening the Great Sea. Equip and upgrade your crew for turn-based gunfights packed with ricochet action and engage in real-time naval combat. Get ready to aim, plot, and plunder in this uproarious Steambot adventure!

name: Eureka
description: A Full Hack for Super Mario 64 with 100 Stars and many things to find. Some things are useful, some are not. That is for you to decide.

name: Security: The Horrible Nights
description: Every time you die, a new story begins. You are the nighttime security guard at a hospital. Your job is to monitor the hospital and fix problems when they happen. Every night, a new horror tale will unfold. If you can survive enough nights, you will learn the truth behind all the horror.

name: Fetish Club
description: From Leather to Chains: Explore Every Fetish Fantasia in Fetish.

name: Diorama Builder: Medieval Castle
description: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "MEDIEVAL CASTLE", which will allow you to assemble a complete Medieval Castle, with a royal bedroom, weapons room, prison, main hall, kitchen and everything with lots of details, such as armor, cannons, crossbows and more!

name: The Tennis Academy
description: The Tennis Academy is a solo-developed action fantasy RPG and dating sim. Uncover the mysteries of the castle-like school while fighting wacky tennis duels with hand-drawn 2D animated characters. Live your best college life, rizz up classmates to become your Doubles Partners, and save tennis!

name: The 13th Floor
description: You are stuck in an infinite loop within a hotel.Keenly observe your surroundings, report any anomalies, confront your fears, and escape the nightmare by reaching your room on the 13th floor.This journey tests your resolve and wits at every turn.

name: Upstream Ante
description: A poker roguelike. Upstream Ante is a hypnotically satisfying card game based on Texas Hold'em where you place powerful bets, discover game-changing jokers, and choose fate cards to buff and debuff yourself as the game gets more intense for intense and adrenaline-pumping games.

name: Evergreen: Pines Expansion
description: Grow new challenges!Spice your matches with new plants and change how your world grows.

name: Evergreen: Cacti Expansion
description: Grow new challenges!Spice your matches with new plants and change how your world grows.

name: Exoprimal: Nimbus Alpha Kimen Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Nimbus α, which provides shotgun melee support. A demon mask imbued with mysterious power! Equip these cosmetic items and bewitch your way victory!

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Alpha Tin Machine Set
description: This pack includes five cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the Tank suit Krieger α, which uses a chargeable shotgun with wide-range scatter shot and compressed fire options. Tin Machine robots transcend generations and are loved by all! Equip these cosmetic items and develop a sturdy defense!

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor Mega Man Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Air Man, with his signature torso propellor. Equip these cosmetic items and dash to the aid of your teammates!

name: Exoprimal: Murasame Alpha Gladiator Set
description: This pack includes five cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the tank Murasame α, which comes with a freezing counterattack. A gladiator in solid armor! Equip these cosmetic items, and scatter your enemies with a swing of your fighting spirit!

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Mega Man Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of the Yellow Devil classic enemy. Equip these cosmetic items and conquer the battlefield like a Yellow Devil!

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Alpha Future Flight Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Skywave, which calls down lightning from above to paralyze foes. Future Flight provides comfortable air travel! Equip these cosmetic items and deliver safe and secure support to your allies!

name: Exoprimal: Vigilant Alpha Insurgent Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Assault suit Vigilant α, which delivers precision blows from a distance. Insurgent, a combat uniform that suits a heavy rifle! Equipped with these cosmetic items, blend in with the battlefield and go after your prey!

name: Rento Fortune: Dice Configurator
description: Rento Dice Configurator is an optional dice editor plugin, which allows you to make your own custom dice to be used in the online, solo and local games. You can make dice like: 0 5 7 7 10 10 or 0 0 10 10 1 1 and be able to choose it before you roll

name: Mojito the Cat: Animals Skins
description: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new animal based skins

name: Raidborn: Founder's Pack
description: The RAIDBORN Founder's Pack offers a collection of rare and exclusive bonus content, typically reserved for special occasions. With 60 legendary items and more than 20 new enchantments introduced to the game, this pack has you covered for all your raiding needs.

name: Barro GT: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro T23: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Eternal Fate: A Journey Begins
description: Old-school style RPG to enjoy a nostalgic tale with difficult and fair gameplay that is fully voiced.

name: Ecto
description: Play as bunny-hopping wizards with flower guns in a never-ending wonderland. Hold a frog in your left hand and a stick gun in your right as you jump around at 25 miles per hour, picking flowers and shooting robots with your friends.

name: Bug & Seek: Weevils DLC
description: This content requires the base game Bug & Seek in order to play.

name: Patriotika RPG: Shadow World
description: Join Patriotika and her team of superheroines and explore New Haven in this comic book-style pixel art RPG!

name: GeoMaze
description: Hexaspherical geo-spatial puzzle game.

name: Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond
description: Welcome, aspiring angler! Pocket Idler: Fishing Pond is the first cast in a series of relaxing and casual idle games designed to deliver bite-sized satisfaction.

name: Pie in the Sky
description: Pluck them. Pluck them all. You are an Australian Magpie on a mission. That mission: Spread havoc, cause mayhem, and grab the occasional unattended piece of food. Menace, rob, and terrify humans, enjoying old-school action arcade gameplay rendered in glorious retro PS2 graphics.

name: Mach Wing
description: In a mythological world dominated by combat ships known as MachWing, Ignis, a brave pilot, will play a significant role. A JRPG-style story unfolds, where battles take on a "Shoot em up" style with RPG and strategy elements. Experience this unusual blend!

name: Ugaris: The Legend Recovered
description: Welcome, Adventurer, to the enigmatic realms of Astonia. A world brimming with danger and opportunity awaits. Arm yourself with valor and let your powers craft your destiny.

name: The College Fantasy Before the End of the Empire
description: A fictional history based text romance adventure game based on the early 20th century. You need to use your choices to determine you, the one you choose, and even the fate of this country in an era where human stars shine.

name: Dissociative
description: A merging of dissociation between dream worlds. Lost in nightmares. Find your way through the desolate worlds, happy dreams and hidden horrors.

name: Lord Of Tower
description: "Lord of Tower" is an action RPG game. Climb the tower and meet the bosses on each floor.Defeat bosses with unique patterns and win in battle. Conquer all the bosses and become the true lord of the tower!

name: Perfect Knife
description: Can you throw the perfect knife?

name: Wrong Number
description: A short yaoi visual novel set in Australia. Go on a date with a stranger, become friends, or maybe something more... or nothing at all.

name: Relict
description: Relict is a sci-fi 3rd person action adventure roguelike shooter with a unique tarot twist on player abilities and enemies. Taking the role of the fool, fight your way through three unique planets to save the universe from a great evil.

name: Figments
description: Embark on a powerful, heartfelt journey in Figments, a third-person action-adventure from VaporLock Labs. Immerse yourself in a hidden world, known only to Henry, where you can explore, craft, and fight to survive. Learn to conquer your deepest fears in this upcoming epic debut title.

name: The Public Domain: The Game
description: The most ambitious asset flip of all time! A new 2D Platformer with Adventure Game elements created by a single rouge nerd! Every single image and sound in this game is taken from a public domain or royalty free source, including a few familiar faces. . .

name: Blue
description: "Blue" is a hardcore platformer game with pixel art style. Players need to complete collection objectives in different levels while avoiding various monsters and obstacles.

name: Sales Employee Takeru-Kun
description: Hello World!! This game is based on the image of a Japanese arcade game from the 70's to early 80's where you could easily play by inserting 1 coin. The player will work hard at his sales job to save L.Planning, a company that has been reincarnated into another world.

name: Cafe Maid Girls: Cute Kemono Lifeguard DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Telebradesco Residência
description: Telebradesco Residência was a home banking cartridge that provided access to Banco Bradesco bank account information directly from your Mega Drive. The cartridge cost around 13-14 reais for pre-existing accounts or given for free to new ones and had a 3,95 monthly fee to access the service.

name: FreshBallFall
description: Colourful 3D-platformer where you help your Ball-friend in his adventures through different levels and obsticles.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ghostly Park Collector's Edition
description: What is the price of eternal life? Stop the atrocious ritual! Don't let evil prevail! The soul hunter will spare no one. Can you master the willpower to win?

name: Season Changer
description: Embark on an epic journey through ancient Crete, where Greek history and mythology come to life. Solve clever puzzles, explore enchanting landscapes and unravel an exciting story. Join Acacio and discover the magic of the seasons today!

name: Robin Hood: Shadow of Nottingham
description: Liberate Nottingham from the dark alliances of Prince John as the daring outlaw Robin Hood. Stick to the shadows of the forest, explore the secrets of Nottinghamshire, fight the enemies of King Richard, gain the favor of factioand shape the fate of Nottingham forever. A historical fantasy RPG.

name: Backrooms Invasion
description: BACKROOMS INVASION is an exciting horror game that will give you a unique experience. Prepare for a challenge that will test your teamwork, wits and endurance! Multiplayer for up to 8 people!

name: Finsternis Kreuz
description: A high-speed barrage-absorbing 2D action movie in which a girl who wields a magic sword that devours everything confronts vampires with two swords. Turn your enemy's power into a sword and devour vampires.

name: Card Master
description: Design your own unique card and play online with friends

name: BattleTanks
description: Welcome to BattleTanks! Join friends to defend animals from moles in co-op game. Explore 5 worlds with 80+ missions. Face bosses, gather tank parts, and craft your machine. Play with up to 4 friends. Ready to save the world?

name: Human Souvenir
description: You just visited the earth and got a famous 'Human Souvenir'. Would you be able to keep your human alive enough time to see them through their whole life cycle?

name: Creature Match
description: Creature Hunt Is A point-and-click Matching Game. With 111 unique, hand-drawn creatures, three difficulty levels, and an endless mode, it offers endless fun for all ages. Players can level up by catching numerous creatures, enhancing their gaming experience.

name: Distant Oceanic Getaway
description: Distant Oceanic Getaway - A Dating Adventure for WLW. You take on the role of Maeve, a heartbroken woman determined to move on from her cheating ex by embarking on this cruise alone. Will Maeve open her heart to new romance and the possibility of finding her soulmate at sea?​​

name: Trojan
description: "Trojan" is the first innovative fantasy war chess game to utilize a synchronous turn-based strategy. The victory depends on whose strategy surpasses the other, determined by who can look further into the unpredictable future.

name: Ninjam!
description: "Ninjam! is a multiplayer action game for up to 4 players where cute ninja characters move freely and compete against each other on a 3D map."

name: Mega Mosaic
description: Mega Mosaic is a meditative game about completing a single enormous puzzle

name: Ruby Dreams: Immortal Promise
description: As a maid in the elegance of a vampire household, use clues from your dreams to earn the love of your masters.

name: Maze Pursuit
description: A Roguelike survival science fiction game, easy to operate, quickly get started

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Misuzu
description: Misuzu is trained in many forms of combat. Students come from far away, eager to learn from her. Sometimes, her lessons can be painful.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Rin
description: Rin always manages to make her patients feel better. Come lie down on the bed, relax, and show her where it hurts.

name: A Difficult Game About Jumping
description: One Small Mistake Will Cost Your Lot Of Progress

name: Plants vs Animals
description: "Plants vs. Animals" is a TD game where players, as plant summoners, collect and upgrade plant cards against animal waves. Victories yield new cards and genetic materials for card mutation and enhancement.Strategic card play and evolution are key

name: Morgman
description: MORGMAN is a first-person horror game, a hybrid of classic survival horror and puzzle. You find yourself deep in the forest, in an abandoned mansion with a dark past. You'll need to explore its dark corridors and rooms while staying alive.

name: Yoru ga Kuru!: Square of the Moon - Remastered
description: Ryou lives a dull life in Otsuna until a red-eyed girl named Izumi invites him to join her fight against the Light Hunters. When the True Moon rises, the Light Hunters descend upon the city, leaving chaos in their wake. Cloaked in the shadows of the night, this story of supernatural suspense begins.

name: Jötunn's Greed
description: Jötunn's Greed is a fast-paced extraction-looter where you raid villages and grow your clan with the loot you acquire. Build up enough power to take on the giant that wronged your people!

name: Lovebugz: An Anthro Insect Dating Sim
description: A point and click visual novel about bug girls.

name: Mini Micro Racing
description: Race through varied environments and master your vehicle to achieve victory. Annihilate your opponents with fun weapons, like the firework or the wasp!

name: World of Crypts
description: Welcome human to the World of Crypts! Here, living or perishing is up to you! Essence is everywhere, allowing mortals to reach even the divine.

name: BossCrafter
description: Challenge various bosses designed by the director using characters with distinct traits. Study classic boss mechanics, hone your combat skills, unlock hundreds of boss abilities, unleash your creativity, and craft a boss that's uniquely yours!

name: Aquarist: Japanese Garden
description: Japanese Garden DLC is all that you love Aquarist for and so much more. The largest and most beautiful location comes with a plethora of new fish, decorations️, plants, and other interesting additions. Get it and start your aquarist relax in Japanese style.

name: There is No Plan B
description: 「There is NO PLAN B」 is a 「Narrative Adventure Game」 set in a cyberpunk world. Step into the shoes of B, a Hikikomori private eye, as you meet clients, investigate crime scenes, gather witness testimonies, and even apprehend suspects yourself. Will you be able to unravel the truth behind each case?

name: Deathtroopers: The Outpost
description: The story is very simple, but it connects directly with the original: a fleeing soldier ends up crashing into Endor. Here he will find death and a deadly virus, already widespread throughout much of the Outer Rim of the known galaxy. Seeking help, he finds an old resistance outpost, seemingly abandoned. In an attempt to find a means of communication to call for help, he enlists the help of his faithful but damaged droid DD5. Having learned of the events that are happening on the planets around his own, he decides to embark on a fight for survival without any other choice.

name: Spellcheck
description: Spellcheck is a daily challenge game styled like a spelling bee, where players are given an audio reading of fifteen different words with their definitions and etymologies, and must attempt to spell them correctly.

name: RGB Rush 2
description: Can you adjust these raw images for a client? Advance your dream of becoming a colour grading professional. Beat the clock, impress your crush again! Practice today! The long awaited sequel.

name: Politician Simulator
description: A short, 5 minute funny game about politicians

name: Ninja Slayer: Neo-Saitama In Flames
description: A fast-paced action platformer based on the world of Ninja Slayer, a hit manga that sold 4.44 million copies! In the fictional cyberpunk city of Neo-Saitama, take control of Ninja Slayer as he does battle with numerous evil ninjas, all to avenge the death of his wife and child.

name: Carnage
description: A love letter to the top-down racing games of yore. Race and shoot your way through a varied dystopian world to collect and upgrade your vehicles to survive and prosper in the CARnage.

name: Fear Tape
description: You are a police officer who needs to investigate an abandoned hospital to remove some invaders, survive the frightening and terrifying environment with your gun and flashlight! Good luck!

name: GrannyHop
description: The game "GrannyHop" is an arcade game where grandma jumps on a graveyard, passes difficult levels, collects bonuses and defeats obstacles. Addictive gameplay and colorful graphics.

name: Innocent Grape
description: Humour and hentai - what could go better together than these!? Become a promiscuous Ann in this 2D visual novel. Help her realize all her crazy sexual fantasies and fulfill her dream! What could go wrong...?

name: Recycling Center Simulator
description: Step into 'Recycling Center Simulator,' a first-person job simulator where you spearhead a recycling operation. Navigate through neighborhoods, workshops, and factories, collecting and sorting a wide variety of materials. Transform waste into wealth by recycling and manufacturing products.

name: Replicore
description: Replicore is a co-op shooter set in an ancient sci-fi world. Transform into your Core to roll, dash or throw your team members into the action or pull them out of tight spots to navigate the challenges of the mysterious ruins. Experience the first true Core-operative gameplay!

name: Melting Encyclopedia
description: Interactive 3d encyclopedia of alien dimensions

name: Bubble Dogs
description: Reunite the dog families of each breed and try to conjure up hearts, kibbles, golden paws and bones to score maximum points !

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
description: Cat Got Your Tongue is a horror point-and-click game where you have to escape from the Cat by exploring the darkest corners of the house.

name: Por um Punhado de Trólares
description: An elderly caregiver simulator, a game about the joint adventures of a Ninja, a Fox, an architectural designer, and the Norse god Heimdall, about my fictional folk/trollcore/hardtroll/trollwave band Trolls of the Mountain where at the end there's the final battle against the current troll king who bought the mountain for around 17 Trolls and ousted the previous leader.

name: No Limite
description: Something a bit Zelda 2D-like, a bit SNES Goof Troop, but you find/use >many< items, and you pick up items that are of no use to the game either. Confusing point-and-click puzzles made worse by useless items. A jaguar eating a contestant from No Limite.

name: Free Trader
description: You are a merchant trading in the vastness of space.

name: O Queijorcista
description: Sin descripción

name: Ushuaïa, Le Jeu: À la Poursuite des Biotrafiquants
description:
A 3rd action-adventure game about saving nature and the animals.
You play as Lena Green, a member of the Ushuaïa Sentinels nature protection organization.
Your mission: to put an end to the activities of biotraffickers.
Run, jump, infiltrate, investigate, coach your teammates... to complete your extreme mission!

name: Camundongo Miguel na Ilha dos Novo Pogos
description: Sin descripción

name: Onibi
description: Dash, possess, and explore your way through different areas as you accompany a child on their adventures as their fledgling guardian spirit.

name: NudGirls
description: NudGirls is a big collection of riddles and puzzles. You are going to explore various worlds and meet incredibly beautiful girls. Pass the test using your intelligence. Undressed charming bodies and no clothes on. Would you like to receive your reward?

name: Barro F22: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Final Fantasy ++ World of Chaos
description: A semi-sequel of the author’s previous hack, Final Fantasy ++. It includes adaptations of various dungeons from FFs 3, 4, 5, & 6, SaGa 2, and Dragon Quest 5, along with a couple of new ones.

name: Cat Meoir: Feline Detective
description: Cat Meoir: Feline Detective is an open world exploration game based in the heart of New York City during the early 1950's. The player must use their cat-like skills to solve puzzles, string together clues, and navigate the city to solve the case of their owners murder.

name: Retrozen
description: Enter the realm of RetroZen, where neon glows amidst palm trees, synthwave tunes echo, and '80s supercars race endlessly on highways. Welcome to RetroZen's world!

name: Oh My God! Crush!
description: What is the most heart wrenching moment for you? Is it a warm smile from the person you like? Or was it a sudden surprise waiting for him? Is it the sweet expectation of ordinary life? Or a sudden look back after a thousand twists and turns—— Oh my goodness! It's a heartwarming feeling.

name: Slime Slayer
description: You play as an adventurer who descended into the dungeon in search of profit. But it's not that simple. The dungeon is full of dangerous slugs! Either you are them, or they are you! Dodge these deadly little monsters. But don't forget about the attack either – kill them all.

name: Roy Rattler
description: Roy Rattler is a survival-horror FPS about being trapped in a theme park after a biotech experiment gone wrong brings it's collection of characters to life as murderous mutants! Engage in non-linear exploration and tense combat with limited resources as you search for an escape!

name: Radiosol
description: RADIOSOL is a journey through a desolate world burned by a planetary cataclysm. In search of answers, you will have to navigate through the ruins of megastructures and abandoned cities, avoiding the scorching rays of the Sun.

name: The Scroll of Black Loong
description: A brand new Eastern-style parenting-simulator-RPG adventure. After losing all your family, the mysterious scroll you protect grants you a sister. You will accompany her as she grows up and cultivate her. Remember, every decision you make is crucial.

name: Truth Seekers
description: Truth Seekers is a horror multiplayer cooperative shooter game centered around hunting urban legends and folklore monsters. Find and craft items to aid in your attack, all while strategizing with others to learn the monsters' behaviors before they learn yours...

name: Who is the Joker?
description: Who Is The Joker is a horror adventure online multiplayer game. As different identities, find various props and various key clues to find out who is the joker or human. Survive and become a champion. Rich and detailed game scenes and thrilling music effects render the exciting atmosphere. Come and play!

name: Where Have All the Globbletops Gone?
description:
The Magnificent Merle, an intrepid entomologist, happens across a mysterious book that hints towards the existence of elusive, mythical creatures called Globbletops. Out of his element, yet desperately in need of grant money for his floundering foundation, he decides to brave the long journey to the Farwaythians Peaks to unravel the ancient mystery of the Globbletops.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 55 in April of 2024, whose theme was Summoning.

name: Shopping Benfica
description: Shopping Benfica is a game about me and my best friend from high school beating the shit out of Totally Not Monica and Friends in Fortaleza.

name: Midgard Lava-a-Jato
description: A washing and dress-up game featuring Final Fantasy characters.

name: Sweet Elite
description:
Flirt and Uncover the Secrets of the Academy. The story and your relationships are shaped by your choices! The way you play is up to you!

Sweet Elite is an online visual novel where you play as scholarship student at Arlington Academy, a prestigious high school only accessible to the best teenagers in their respective fields worldwide.

name: Two Fates
description: "Two Fates" is a cooperative MAP-pack for Serious Sam made for two players, where coordinated teamwork needed to successfully complete each level. It consists of 4 maps, different in style and difficulty.

name: Predator
description: You play an eagle defending its territory.

name: Eternis: Death Match
description:
Eternis: Death Match, the ultimate arena where ancient legends and futuristic technology collide in heart-pounding battles!
Choose from a roster of iconic characters like Cleopatra and Isaac Newton, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Engage in intense one-on-one duels, thrilling tournaments, and epic guild wars as you climb the ranks to become a legend in your own right.

Explore dynamic environments, hone your skills, and discover new strategies in this ever-evolving battlefield. With regular updates, new features, and exciting events, there's always something new to experience in Eternis: Death Match.

But Eternis is more than just a game; it's a living, breathing world shaped by its passionate community.
Join our Discord community to unlock exclusive behind-the-scenes content, participate in lively discussions, and collaborate with developers to shape the game's future. Your feedback matters, and together, we'll continue to evolve Eternis into the ultimate gaming experience.

Are you ready to write your own legend? Join us in Eternis: Death Match and let the battles begin!

name: Ultimate Play The Game: The Collected Works
description: Sin descripción

name: One Day Hike
description: ONE DAY HIKE is a brief interactive fiction where you revisit an old, familiar hiking trail and recount the memories that you've tried-- and failed-- to leave behind.

name: The Ruby Court
description: The Ruby Court is an interactive fiction game that takes inspiration from 90s and 2000s vampire fiction, with themes about conformity/the queer experience. And blood. Lots of blood.

name: Supermarket Shopping Simulator
description: Shopping Strategies: Beyond the Cart

name: Alien Garden
description: Welcome to Alien Garden, a fast-paced first person roguelike with permadeath mechanics, unique class abilities, randomly generated dungeons, intense boss fights, multiplayer online bullet-hell and a vibrant player-based economy. Join the battle now!

name: Aetherise
description: You are created as a new soul directly from the Aether, you don't know why you're here or what you're supposed to do. As you start exploring the world, you start making up choices for yourself, and eventually decide how the world around you will evolve with you.

name: 22 Minutes
description: In 22 Minutes, players must conquer barriers and fight opponents to progress through the story under a time constraint of 22 minutes.

name: Dead Crossway Zompell Survival Zombie
description: "Zompell Survival Zombie" on Steam pits players against waves of undead. Earn XP to unlock spells, compete on leaderboards, and anticipate updates and multiplayer. Survive the apocalypse in "Zompell Survival Zombie."

name: Critical Upload
description: Embark on a fast-paced action journey through space, discovering new weapons and abilities through acquisition and research to better each run. Invite friends to experience it with you!

name: Capibara Lost Dream
description: Enjoy the story of Frank and his adventure to escape from an island dominated by a cult of humanoid Capybaras, fight, explore, have sex and meet lots of fun characters!

name: Blood Within
description: With the fall of the mighty Bloodstar, the universe plunged into chaos. Unleash your inner power alongside Captain Thorne, vanquish demons, and restore the order of light.

name: Blood Typers
description: TYPE TO KILL in this survival horror adventure. Alone or with friends, explore a sprawling cursed film studio as its horror movies bleed into reality. Choose from a roster of characters then plan your escape from this bloody homage to old school horror. But remember... death is just a typo away.

name: Anomaly Hotel
description: You start from the 10th floor in a hotel and must make your way to the exit. However, you must look for any potential anomalies on each floor to safely make it out.

name: Any Way Out
description: Explore a mysterious hotel's treacherous corridors to reach the bottom floor and escape. Use your wits to spot anomalies, avoiding traps to progress. Trust your intuition to overcome challenges and find freedom.

name: Boats N' Hoes
description: Boats N' Hoes is a combat game based around using boats as a player and hoes as a weapon type. Attack other boats with hoes and avoid their hoes to become the best at Boats N' Hoes.

name: Celebrity Hunter
description: The most ambitious indie adult VN with 70+ hours of gameplay! Live your hottest fantasies with 9 main characters (and dozens of others) in 3,500+ 4k scenes. Create your cinematic story with 2,100+ impactful choices and over 30 endings! After 3 mi downloads in Brazil, CH comes to seduce you!

name: Descent: The Dark Corridors
description: Terror, chases and terrifying creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what happens, never be left alone in the dark.

name: Diegesis of The Ruined
description: A dark Christian-based post-apocalyptic survival card game, that is a retelling about the last community of survivors who were traveling the lands trying to survive and constantly seeking a safe place from the horrors that have come upon the earth, which were born from the sins of humanity.

name: Uberich: Advent Sinners
description: The elusive shadow, the horrifying tunnel, the assassin, the haunted ruin, the High-orbit Space Station, the Creators, the Power Words, the religious wars, and the organization that only exist in Annie's words. What kind of future will it create when these seemingly irrelevant pieces come together?

name: Wax Heads
description: A cosy-punk slice-of-life narrative sim about managing a struggling record store. Chat to quirky customers with unique tastes, explore a handcrafted record collection, fall in love with bands (and their drama!), or just slack off with your colleagues – all to restore the groove!

name: Wild West Blast
description: Welcome to Wild West Blast – Your Ultimate Adventure in the Wild West and Your New Favorite Aim Trainer!Step into the boots of a fearless bounty hunter in the heart of the untamed prairie.

name: Steal It
description: Owners and thieves fight to see which team has collected the most coins at the end of the game. The owners' task is to identify the thieves and lock them up. But they have to be careful not to imprison any of their own people.

name: Scrollden
description: Home-building meets nurturing mythological creatures.

name: Scrap Collector
description: In Scrap Collector collect, combine, and automate card production. Make your robot empire and take on the enemies of the overgrown and mutated earth.

name: The Reeve
description: You are an Administrator serving your probationary period in a medieval town. Make decisions to affect the town's reputation, order, might and supplies. Choose wisely to deal with bandits, famines, cultists and plagues. The most difficult choices will decide the fate of your town!

name: The Mournmore Killings
description: The Mournmore Killings a story-driven, deduction based mystery game where you step into the shoes of a detective trying to solve the enigmatic riddles left behind by a serial killer.

name: The Math Challenge
description: Embark on a thrilling space adventure as an astronaut, where logic and math are your keys to survival. Navigate through challenges, unravel mysteries, and conquer the cosmos.

name: The Clown's Forest: Fear of a Survivor
description: Sarah Baines somehow survived the trap in that basement. She is trapped in the collapsed house of horrors in Hartown Amusement Park, and Chester is relentlessly pursuing her. But something dark is manifesting around her. Can she survive the horrors?

name: Terminal Escape
description: No docs. No tutorial. No escape. Inspired by a bad day with a package manager.

name: Touhou: Dreams of a Sunflower
description: Touhou meets Dark Souls. A 3D bullet hell soulslike fangame about exploring dreams and tending to flowers.

name: Horny Mage Chronicles
description: A succubus has attacked your home, leaving you the only one to have escaped. A mysterious witch has rescued you, and proposes that you defeat the succubus... with your body?

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Antrius Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Antrius (if you don't already own them) Plushie Antrius Skin An Epic Feat for Antrius 7 Gold Antrius Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Action Figure Melf Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Melf (if you don't already own them) Action Figure Melf Skin An Epic Feat for Melf 7 Gold Melf Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Love at The Milky Way Diner
description: A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.

name: Medical Diagnostic Simulator
description: Play as a general practitioner in this text-based medical simulation game. Consult, examine, and diagnose your patients in your own medical practice.

name: Million Star Ship
description: This is a single player defense game for interstellar strategy. We have established 36 birth points. Players can freely switch birth points to control the size of the enemy. Set the moon as a base. Our fleet can conquer the universe and find legendary warships. Our journey is the sea of stars.

name: Néro & Sci ∫ Integral Edition
description: Solve the mysteries of this logical world and enter the captivating world of Néro and Sci.

name: Pawn Legends
description: It is time to make the dream a reality! -Name's Mick, and you have a Pawn Shop on your hands, located at the beautiful Sunset Bay. Restore, Expand, Renovate, Manage and Grow your Shop to become the #1 business on this island!

name: Plane Starship2: Galactic Contender
description: This is a 4x turn-base strategy game which uses a fast-paced warchess system. You can develop your planet, expand your territory by colonizing and building space stations, research technology to unlock more ships, and ultimately discover and eliminate your enemies.

name: DunJaunt
description: A focused dungeon running romp through the fantasy world of Relaryia! The land is sliding into chaos, and it's up to you with the help of a party of 4 elemental avatars to bring balance back to the world. Pick your favorites from Fire, Water, Storm, Earth, Light, and Darkness and cleanse the world!

name: Elemental Novice
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in a world of elemental magic. Play as a young wizard mastering the elements to survive against dark forces. Explore haunting landscapes, hone your spells, and unravel mysteries while battling supernatural foes in this captivating adventure

name: Fairy Biography 6: Revenge
description: In the game, players need to use mouse clicks to control gunpowder props, and through careful aiming and calculation, continuously fire cannons to clear all the treasure boxes in front of them!

name: Fallen
description: Description:This game is a psychic action game. Escape from the maze-like research facility by manipulating telekinesis, levitation, and teleportation.

name: Fantasy Quest: Errandsaga
description: Bin, has been brainwashed by the demon 'Basilisk'.Visit the mercenary agency 'Ninas Errand' on the continent of Mirgard.

name: Forest of Fear
description: On a mission to explore a secret island discovered by the military, your plane crashes, leaving you as the sole survivor. Now, on the Island of the Condemned, your only concern is to survive and escape at any cost.

name: Ghost Moon High Noon
description: Guide the half-ghost bounty hunter Valentina Sombra through the haunted town of La Enmienda in this western top-down puzzle-shooter. Fire off spectral trick shots and wrangle your environment to put down rowdy spirits and help the grieving townsfolk move on.

name: Harlot's Diary
description: In a ruthless world where you've lost everything, only desperate measures remain. Fight to survive as a sex worker and reach the top, avoiding deceit, murderers, and abuse on your path to success.

name: Haus of Irndrous
description: Delve into a chilling psychological horror experience, set within the confines of a sinister mansion. Solve intricate puzzles, evade twisted adversaries—partially human animatronics—and unearth the truth behind your father's vanishing act. Brace for escalating challenges at every turn.

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Pentaga Maid Outfit #1
description: Pentaga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Pentaga

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Quadra Maid Outfit #1
description: Quadra Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Quadra

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Temiko Maid Outfit #1
description: Temiko Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Temiko

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Trianga Maid Outfit #1
description: Trianga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Trianga

name: Minion Masters: Frostbite
description:
The Frostbite DLC is a great +300% value bundle to empower your Accursed undead army! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- Nyrvir the Fallen (Legendary card)
- 20x Frostbearer (Supreme card)
- Nyrvir Awakens Avatar (Legendary Avatar)
- 20x Haunting Hugger
- 40x Ghost Turret
- 40x Ghast
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Harness the power of the beyond with this unholy DLC. Freeze and Curse your enemies with Frostbearear and Haunting to weaken them before you finish them off, then raise them to fight for you with Ghast. Playing enough Accursed cards will let you summon Nyrvir the Fallen, a mighty dragon that will lay waste to your enemies.

name: Project Apidom: Classic Samurai Set
description: Classic Samurai Armor Set including the Helmet, Chestpiece, Leggings, Gloves and Boots

name: Idle Champions: Chibi Spurt Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Spurt (if you don't already own them) Chibi Spurt Skin An Epic Feat for Spurt 7 Gold Spurt Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Oga Line (Akita to Oga) EV-E801 series
description: The Oga Line is a 26.4 km long line connecting Oiwake Sta. in Akita City, Akita Prefecture, to Oga Sta. in Oga City, Akita Prefecture.All trains operate directly to the Ou Line, and this DLC includes a 39.4 km long section, including a portion between Akita Sta. and Oiwake Sta. on the Ou Line.

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Four Cage Gourmet Pack
description: Welcome to the future of the Primate Observation Club. In this second DLC called "Two Cage Seasoning Pack", spy on strangers through four new security cameras, invade their privacy, and uncover their secrets in this digital voyeur simulator.

name: Farmer's Life: Pimp my Cottage
description: Requested by the players, delivered by the devs. Pimp my Cottage is the first DLC to Farmer's Life where you get a full interior/exterior design, new concrete and block buildings, and adorable cats and dogs. Don't be a wimp just pimp it.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1970 Matra-Simca #146 Equipe Matra-Simca MS650 Tour de France
description: Forza Motorsport 1970 Matra-Simca #146 Equipe Matra-Simca MS650 Tour de France

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Additional Episode 2 - Record's Fragment: Yagyu Sword Chronicles
description: The power of the Ritual swirling around Edo attracts many oddities. Tsujigiri of tremendous skill. A mysterious deadly blade. Investigating the situation, Miyamoto Iori comes face to face with Yagyu Munenori, a Rogue Saber.

name: Baltic Folk
description: Immerse in Baltic folklore, manage a cozy tavern, and craft epic tales. Join us on a whimsical journey!

name: Boog Doodles
description: Boog Doodles is a chill narrative game about a young artist on her journey to draw all the fantastic bugs in the land of Slava.

name: Out of Sight
description: Out of Sight is an urban fantasy story-driven 2D adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Set in the present of the decaying mining town in the Mostecko region, archaeology student Nela has to use her wit and knowledge to uncover the truth behind the strange occurrences.

name: Paradise Tycoon
description: Build your paradise, have fun with friends & become ultimate tycoon in Paradise Tycoon's multiplayer world!

name: One Good Turn Deserves Another
description: The game is based on the "Solomonar" myth from Romanian folklore. Solomonars are wizards, blessed with the power of controlling the weather. It is said that each Solomonar is able to control a Balaur, a giant winged snake, which has the ability to enhance their already supernatural powers. One legend states that these wizards travel from village to village, usually dressed as beggars, and ask for food or shelter. Denying their request will bring bad weather over the village, but they also offer rewards to those who help.

name: Before The After
description: Before The After (by David Irimia & Daniel Hristescu) is an escape-room-like game where you play as a soul stuck in the afterlife of the Great Passing. In the afterworld, you will play out the lore of the Romanian purgatory as told by folklore stories.

name: Avetinja
description: Avetinja (pronounced ə-ve-tɪ-njɑ:) is a puzzle roguelike RPG inspired by Serbian and Slavic myth. Players take on the role of one of three classes as they fight their way through various monsters, hoping to reach the castle that's "neither in the sky nor on the earth" and defeat the dreaded Avetinja.

name: Pocket Music
description: Make music on the move with Pocket Music, the music creation game. Create your own music from a selection of samples, drum beats, baselines, melodies, and other musical instruments. Play them back, save them to your cartridge, or swap them with a friend. Features include more than 600 different high quality samples and instruments, custom drumbeats, baselines, melodies and sound effects, a riff editor to allow you to create your own sounds, and prearranged tracks to demonstrate the capabilities of the game.

name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Pocket Planner
description: Is your life totally disorganized? Do you lose track of what you need to do? Have you lost the phone number of the cutest guy in school? Get organized with MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner for the Game Boy Color. Use the calendar to keep track of all those really important messages and never forget a phone number with the phone book. You can also write super-secret messages to your friends and beam them to another Game Boy Color. In addition to these features, several games have been included. You can help raise Mary-Kate and Ashley's dog, Clue. If you have a question, go to Ask Ashley, and she will check her crystal ball for an answer. If you are completely unorganized and need some help, run out and get MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner.

name: Kupala Night
description: Text quest in the genre of Slavic fantasy.

name: Who Axed You?
description: Slay the weather wizards and their dragons because they bothered you as Vasile, an axe throwing drunk peasant! This game is based on the Romanian myth about solomonars and dragons.

name: The Wonderful Life of Koshchei
description: A visual novel based on Koshchei from Slavic folklore who is living peacefully.

name: Dark as Blood
description:
Dark as Blood is a short, text-based horror game inspired by Slavic folklore by Masha Lepire and Eugene Fasano.

Close the sidebar, put on headphones, and make the game full screen for a more immersive experience.

name: Slavic Feast
description: In the game players (up to 4) reinact roles during slavic feast of commemoration (also known as "Dziady"). By summoning and satisfying the needs of lost souls, players get rewarded by completing soul's wishes in given time. If they fail to do so, they shall be punished.

name: Sweet Blend
description:
Ever wanted to have your very own mutual pining, friends-to-lovers coffee shop romance, complete with a best friend to gush about your feelings to?

Then you're in luck!

Meet Avery Mercier, your only solace in the pit of despair that is a 9-5 office job...

And your longtime crush.

Experience the embarrassment/joy of finally making a move to ask him out on a date (or not, whatever floats your boat) and getting to know him better over a nice, casual cup of coffee.

Who knows, maybe it'll lead to something much deeper? ;)

name: Death Is A Guest
description:
Your story starts when your best friend gives you an invitation to her boss' luxury Halloween party. Excited to meet new people and enjoy a few drinks, you plan to make this night unforgettable. However, everything changes when a dead body appears in the main hall.

Dreams become nightmares. Friends turn into hunters. The prince is now a monster.

Playing the role of detective in a horror movie, you now have no choice but to fight for your life.

The season of treats and tricks has arrived. It's time to get your costumes out of your wardrobe and party, as your life depends on it!

Dance, flirt, and solve a mystery. But do it all before the night ends.

name: Ken to Mahou
description:
Set in a medieval world called Border Land, an evil wizard has besieged the kingdom, killing its benevolent ruler and taking the princess captive. With the land swept in chaos, the player must brave numerous challenges to defeat the wizard and restore peace. Nine character archetypes may be chosen as the player's avatar; each one is given a unique set of attributes, affecting their battle performance.

Explore towns and castles for various recovery spots, while engage in one-on-one battles with varying physical attacks and magic effectiveness, based on the player's chosen class.

name: Arfgaldt
description: Argaldt (アルフガルド) is a text-based role-playing adventure published by ASCII in 1984.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
description: A thrilling story-driven action RPG, with a rich open world, set in 15th century Medieval Europe. Experience the ultimate medieval adventure - through the eyes of young Henry - as you embark on a journey of epic proportions.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Persona 3: Aegis The First Mission
description: The setting is Yakushima in 1999. A story depicting Aegis' unknown past.

name: Genma Taisen
description: Sin descripción

name: Clickpocalypse
description: Clickpocalypse is an incremental game disguised as an idle RPG. Create a party to bravely explore terrible dungeons and mercilessly exterminate every monster in the world. Find items, go up levels, learn spells, upgrade abilities, and earn achievements.

name: Waffle
description: Waffle is a daily word game of letters and logic. Rearrange the letters to solve the words. The top score is awarded for solving the puzzle in the least number of moves.

name: Carcass
description: A Short experimental Horror game set on a Dead Earth.

name: B3ndy
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Fast & Furious Expansion Pack
description: Step into Dom's Garage, where you can transform your cars into true four-wheeled powerhouses, and experience the thrills of Fast & Furious with the most adrenaline-pumping set of cars inspired by the films!

name: My Hamster Pet
description: your virtual hamster friend

name: Solomonaris
description: Discover the mythological legend of The Solomonari in this adventure story-rich game. You will play from 2 different perspectives and unveil the mystery of Father Iancu, his son Ptolomeu and Solomon. Featuring stunning graphics, beautiful voice lines and 4 different levels for over 15 minutes of gameplay.

name: Fat-Frumos & The Solomonar
description: Short Game for Vianu Game Jam

name: Dead Island 2: SoLA
description: Stage dive into the heart of SoLA, the ultimate Californian music festival, built upon ancient grounds... Stalking the pulsating heart of LA's final rave is a psychedelic beat that has unleashed total chaos, leaving nothing but a rotting crater of gore and a malevolent presence haunting the shadows. Something is out there and it’s still hungry.

name: 2D Solomonar's Apprentice
description: She is not yet trained in the solomonar way, nor she has a dragon to ride against the dark spawn but her crocodile pet Costel has an idea!

name: MineSorter
description: Put mines in the correct folder before they explode! Drag to select multiple mines for more score.

name: Requiem: En mordgåta på 1600-talet
description: Have you ever wanted to travel through time? Or step into another person and see the world as they do? The original game Requiem takes you to 17th century Sweden, to a stunning replica of Ekenäs Castle. You are thrown into an exciting murder mystery - and you are the victim! As a restless spirit, you can inhabit other people's bodies. Through the eyes of the other castle inhabitants, you experience reality, immerse yourself in the mystery, and search for your murderer. You will not rest until the mystery is solved...

name: Poibos Part 1: Dasshutsu
description: Poibos (a misspelling of Phoebus) is a Japanese-made role-playing game. The small paying window displays a rather abstract map on which the player can navigate the characters. The game begins with Jorg only, but up to six characters may join the party and participate in combat afterwards. The characters' stamina bar is depleted depending on the terrain they walk on, and they need to rest regularly. Turn-based battles require balancing offensive and defensive manoeuvres, as well as actively protecting weaker party members. The game has a fairly complex weapon system, with several weapon types, all of which (due to the protagonist's outlaw status) can only be acquired by stealing or as battle trophies. Weapon energy deteriorates over time, having major impact on battle performance.

name: Dragon Lair
description: Sin descripción

name: Megdan
description:
It is that time of the year again when mighty Slavic gods of Light and Darkness gather to determine who is the most powerful of them all.

And you are invited!

Pledge yourself to one of the Great Powers and take control over 3 epic heroes slugging it out with the enemy god's champion and their heroes.

name: Corpse Killer
description: A slightly enhanced port of Corpse Killer released for the Sega CD 32X.

name: Fahrenheit
description:
Fahrenheit is a full motion video game published by Sega and developed by Sega Studios for release on the Sega CD and Sega CD 32X in 1995. This is the Sega CD version, which is a downgrade to the Sega CD 32X version.

Both versions were bundled and sold together as one package for the North American release, while Japan and Europe only saw the Sega CD version released.

name: Fahrenheit
description: The North American version of Fahrenheit contains both the SEGA CD and the SEGA CD 32X releases of the game. Both the SEGA CD and the 32X console add-ons are required in order to play the SEGA CD 32X disc.

name: Night Trap
description: Enhanced version of Night Trap released for the Sega CD 32X.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: DC Elseworlds Skin Pack
description: Three new character skins. The DC Elseworlds Skin Pack delivers DC Comics inspired versions of Mortal Kombat characters including Darkest Knight Noob Saibot, Killer Krok Baraka and Katwoman of Outworld Kitana.

name: Final Fantasy Renaissance
description:
A fangame tribute to the original Final Fantasy game released by Square on the NES. There are currently two distinct game modes in FFR. “Classic Mode” and “Renaissance Mode”.
Classic Mode is intended as a faithful recreation of the original Final Fantasy gam, but with all known bugs fixed.
Renaissance Mode is the same core game as Classic Mode, but with a number of new job classes available to choose from, as well as new game mechanics added. The new job classes are all based on job classes introduced in later games in the Final Fantasy series (such as Evoker, Lancer, Blue Mage, and many more).

name: Slam City with Scottie Pippen
description: Enhanced port of Slam City with Scottie Pippen for the Sega CD 32X.

name: Supreme Warrior
description:
Enhanced port with improved visuals of Supreme Warrior for the Sega CD 32X.
A Sega Saturn version was also planned for release in March 1996, but was later cancelled.

name: The Nightmare Of Arrival Chapter 1
description: Simon Story.... After retiring from the military, Simon's descent into alcohol addiction leads him to a fateful night of heavy drinking. A fall down a flight of stairs renders him unconscious,

name: BackRooms's 1995 The Lost Footage: Chapter 1
description: My name is Jacob i am 25 years old I heard there was a lot of rumor's that if find this abandoned house you start to see things but i am here to Find my brother, He went missing sometime in January of 1970 Missing posters my brother was one of them.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 3
description: Leave no friend behind: The Konni Group has left its indelible mark on Fortune’s Keep and is now occupying another landmass — the infamous Rebirth Island comes back to Call of Duty: Warzone! Rally your squad and investigate this hottest of drops at the start of Season 3. Elsewhere in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, expect one of the biggest Multiplayer map drops ever, with six new Core 6v6 maps. Also included are four free base weapons; eight Aftermarket Parts; Ranked Play (including Resurgence on Rebirth Island); the arrival of Makarov and Snoop Dogg; and two brand-new Operators to the premium Battle Pass, Banshee and Hush.

description: A fascinating adventure telling a wonderful, touching story

name: Knight's Redemption: War for Freedom

name: Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures
description:
Embark on a feline-fueled journey in "Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures"! This thrilling 2D platformer game invites players into a whimsical world where our daring hero, Puss in Boots, sets out on a daring quest to save the day.

As Puss in Boots, players must traverse through enchanting landscapes, leaping across platforms and collecting coins to unlock a treasure trove of upgrades. Gather enough coins to customize your adventure with powerful bullets and fortify your health, arming yourself for the challenges ahead.

name: Sowon : The Toy Wonderland
description: One night, the attic door, the one that was always closed, slid open, sending a girl falling into a strange world. Will she ever be able to get back home?

name: The Epyx Collection: Handheld
description: Witness the return of six awesome Epyx classics from the 1980s/90s, originally designed for cutting-edge handheld gaming.

name: Purple Slime Production Line
description: Guide the slimes to their destiny, across 100 levels of gravity shifting puzzle action!

name: Our Field Trip Adventure

A school trip is all about learning and having fun!
Have a blast and make memories with your friends!

name: Arcade Archives: Emeraldia
description: "EMERALDIA" is a puzzle action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993. The falling cubes can be crashed by dropping them twice with the same color and bumping them together. The game has three modes: adventure mode to enjoy the story, normal mode to enjoy the puzzles, and head-to head play mode.

name: Dracula vs. Monsters
description: Will you emerge as the ultimate hunter of the night, or succumb to the insatiable hunger of the undead?

name: Escape Game The Dr. Mouse's Lab
description:
Who's smarter? Dr.Mouse or you!?
Use items smartly and get out of the lab!!
