name: The Legend of Snow Maiden
description: "The Legend of Snow Maiden" is a turn based role-playing game inspired by ancient Chinese mythology. The player takes on the role of the brave female hero Akira Sakura, embarking on an adventure to search for the reincarnation of the Golden Boy and the assistance of the Snow Maiden.

name: Wandering Planet: Prelude
description: Star Trek: Prelude is a space-based game that builds defense towers on earth to defend against alien invaders called Black Ember.

name: Unbroken
description: Unbroken is a Sports Simulation Roleplay Action Game with Pro Kick Thai Boxing Elements. Create a newbie and become a Superstar, get the golden cup and fight your way to the top. Not only is it a sports game, but there are also more mini-games and surprises waiting for you.

name: Dream of the Limbo
description: "Dream of the Limbo," is a 2D platform action game centered around "swooping." You will continuously navigate through space, avoiding relentless attacks from enemies and eliminating them.

name: Ouch! So Many Beauties!
description: The player transforms into the male lead "Lu Ming" and meets six beautiful women with vastly different styles. They may be pure schoolgirls, high cold models, hot OL, anime cute girls, pure love daughters, tender female teachers..

name: Universe Wars
description: Universe Wars is a multiplayer game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. Plants become evil Earthlings, and zombies become cuddly three-eyed aliens. And on the basis of "Plants vs. Zombies" and increased the multiplayer online, fashion system, formation evolution, protagonist system.

name: Yuyuko is suffering from lack of appetite
description: You will play the role of Youmu, moving forward and unlocking new abilities, using close and long-range attacks to break through enemy obstacles, using agile skills such as climbing walls and sprinting to overcome terrain obstacles, and ultimately solving problems.

name: Bottakuri Taxi
description: Customers... Don't let them find out... Rip-off! A thrilling rip-off adventure where if the customers find out, you'll explode!

name: Adult Puzzle: Hentai Maid Aruha
description: Maid Aruha is here for you..She will take care of you.

name: 420Blaze It 2: Game of the Year
description: The long awaited sequel to the FPS hit is coming! You will no scope. You will blaze it. You will hallucinate some weird af s*** as you fight and xD inside your mind in 999fps to destroy the Illuminati and rescue the memes. Are you ready for 420BLAZEIT 2????!!1

name: All Fridges are Psychotic
description: Roll Camera: Julius Brown's Adventure Begins!A retro-style point-and-click adventure, helping Julius Brown get to the Californian film-maker competition.Julius will negotiate puzzles, time travel and weak coding to try and win his ultimate prize.

name: Asian Foxes
description: Cute Asian Foxes wag their tails and pin their ears. They are alert and sniffing with their noses, one claps her hands and the other even bares her fangs in excitement. You go to meet them.

name: Astro Attack
description: A single-stick arcade shoot 'em up inspired by the golden years of retro gaming. Collect and combine powerups to blast your way through waves of invaders while competing on global leaderboards. Complete missions, discover secrets, and unlock over 80 unique ships from every era of gaming.

name: Celestium
description: An open world survival game set in space.

name: Breach the Abyss
description: A sci-fi wave-based shooter with roguelite elements. Collect powerful upgrades and unique combinations to wipe out hordes of bloodthirsty creatures and make your way into the Abyss.

name: Biped 2
description: Adorable robots are back to save the day! Explore an unknown planet in this puzzle action-adventure game and experiment with our unique, innovative mechanics solo or in co-op with up to 4 players!

name: Bedtime: Turn Off the Life
description: This is a third-person adventure game based on the traditional Chinese funeral custom of do Seven. Are there ghosts in this world? Nobody knows, let alone how to see a ghost. I heard that if you do Seven Destructions, you can see the dead paper figures. How about giving it a try? Then pass away!

name: Uncanny Labyrinth
description: Uncanny Labyrinth is a limited space survival game that uniquely combines the characteristics of survival, horror, puzzle solving and maze adventure games. Players will wake up in the center of a complex maze without any clues. Let's try to see if they can survive and escape from this strange maze.

name: Unlimited Worlds
description: 类roguelite的无限流3D像素游戏

name: Vagrant Moon
description: Vagrant Moon is a charming 3D platformer that captures the classic feel and simplicity of PS1-era games. The game invites you on a serene treasure hunt through its vibrant landscapes, where every treasure not only enhances your abilities but also unlocks new areas of the enchanted valley to explore.

name: Will I Survive Tonight?
description: Unravel the secrets of your inherited house in this eerie survival adventure. Craft, explore, and confront the unknown to escape the nightmare within.

name: Urayama
description: Urayama is a psychological J-horror game featuring students on summer vacation.

name: Weekend Hentai
description: Are you ready to unleash your charm and embark on a thrilling weekend filled with passion, excitement, and unforgettable moments? Get ready to experience "Weekend Hentai" and discover where your desires will lead you!

name: Windward Horizon
description: Windward Horizon is an upcoming RPG-adventure set on the high seas, a sequel to the game Windward released on Steam in 2015. Trade, quest, fight, or just sail the world and fish — it’s your choice, and you can do it alone or together with your friends.

name: Working On It
description: Im Working On It ( the description )

name: Zavod: Conveyor Logic
description: ZAVOD is a minimalist puzzle game focused on setting up conveyor line operations.

name: Guardian Girls: Astral Battle
description:
The world is attacked by monsters called Astral Spirits. Play as Necta, Mikan, Mao, and Ghina and defend the earth by shooting all the Astral Spirits. Help the girls battle all the astral spirits.

Guardian Girls: Astral Battle is a simple shmup game with a lot of bullets (bullet hell). Player have to dodge the incoming bullets and enemies while shooting and destroy the enemies. You don’t need internet and you can play this game offline.

name: The Lost Village: JiangHu
description: The Out World undergoes another anomaly, with a mysterious sect rising. Its members come from various sects, their realms far surpass average humans, viewed almost as divine or saintly. Once unpredictable and secretive, some hidden in wilderness or concealed in bustling areas....

name: The Ramen Stand
description: The Ramen Stand is a ramen simulator horror game based on a ramen stand.

name: Tunnel Assault
description: “Pilot your spaceship through unyielding tunnels, dodging obstacles, and unleashing dual lasers in this procedurally generated, fast-paced adventure. Upgrade your arsenal as you advance, race against time, and emerge as the ultimate tunnel ace!”

name: Tower Knight
description: Tower Knight is a deck-building tower defense roguelike. Play your cards well, build your deck wisely, and move your knight to strategic points to survive enemy waves. Will you be able to build a deck that conquers this enchanted land?

name: The Witch's Redemption
description: Step into a world shrouded in mystery and peril in “The Witch’s Redemption,” an RPG teeming with narrative depth and strategic intrigue. Unravel the mysteries that hold Alice captive through captivating dialogues, thrilling battles, and cunning investigations.

name: The Well of Life Cannot Move
description: An Idle Auto Battler Reverse-Bullet Hell Score Attack game. Collect life essence from an endless waves of enemies!

name: The Last Warmage
description: The Last Warmage is a fast-paced, new take on Tower Defense where mana management and strategic spellcasting are crucial. The main campaign follows the story of the dark elf Yoradhin, expanded with a variety of side quests.

name: The Last Spin
description: The last spin originally named 'Casino?' is a deck-building roguelike that disguises itself as a slot machine. How many spins until the last spin?

name: The Last Mission
description: The Last Mission is an auto-battler and space battle simulation game where you command a fleet of spacecraft in vast, strategic battles. Equip, configure and upgrade them to be ready to battle the enemy.

name: Boris and the Dark Survival: The Wolf Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Tearfallen
description: Rise against the Origins of Primorden! Join forces and embark on Expeditions in a dynamic Online Action Roguelite Adventure. Fight intense battles, and make choices that unveil part of your story, defining your path in this epic saga.

name: Terminal Defense
description: The only tower defense game in the world that is played in the terminal. I didn't make this game because it was a good idea, I made it because I thought it was cool.

name: Tetrachroma
description: Tetrachroma expands the tetromino stacking action of classic puzzle games with a new color changing mechanic inspired by Reversi. Stack blocks and change colors in a wide variety of modes.

name: The Adventures of Lily & Leo
description: Discover the magical world of Lily and Leo and help them find their faithful companion Quattro in this captivating puzzle adventure. Set up a tripod, follow animal tracks, have clever conversations and much more to track down the missing dog.

name: Ray
description: Dive into the immersive depths of RAY, an eerie dystopian deep-sea adventure. Locate hidden items to witfully solve physics based puzzles. Navigate the abandoned station with stealth as vicious predators roam the abyss. If spotted; Hide!

name: Queen's Loyalty
description: Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle. You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.

name: Project Silverfish
description: Navigate around dangerous anomalies to uncover powerful artifacts. Sneak past, fight or manipulate enemies with a diverse set of tools and weapons. Overcome daunting environmental hazards to press deeper into a hostile and mysterious exclusion zone...

name: Run and Hunt: Skeleton Rebellion
description: You are a brave traveler who got lost in a dark labyrinth, beware of the evil skeletons. The evil skeletons know where you are, and they are already hunting you. Can you defeat them?

name: Seductress
description: Create the desired character and send her to explore and fight with aroused humans and monsters. Become the heroine and seduce as many creatures as possible, she will be punished after defeated and enjoy the interactions with them.

name: Skeleton Village
description: Old dilapidated houses, crumbling planks, an old moldy well, an oppressive atmosphere and limited space. The walls erected around the perimeter put pressure on the nerves.

name: Sleep Swimmer
description: Sleep Swimmer is a narrative adventure game where you play as Aria, an anxious girl who escapes her overstimulating world by visiting an underwater town full of salamander people in her dreams. Swim around and collect sounds, mix them on your DJ set, and make salamander friends!

name: Mission: Mars
description: Protect Mars from waves of enemies in "Mission: Mars." As Sergeant Eric, lead your team through 60 intense days of battle. Choose suits, upgrade weapons to ensure the survival of humanity's future on the Red Planet.

name: Money Farm
description: Hey you! Ya, you! Are you a poor, broke loser who is down on their luck? If the answer is yes, then oh boy, does Soke Co. industry have the deal for you! For the low low, price of 1 billion dollars, Soke Co. industry will lease you one of their patented money farms! But wait, a billion dollars isn't a low price for you. Never fear, friend Soke Co. won't ask for anything upfront, and after you start, money will grow on trees. It's a deal too good to be true. So what are you waiting for? Sign up for your money farm today!

name: Mr. Woodpecker
description: You play as a detective investigating an empty hotel. You are close to solving the mystery of this hotel. Explore the rooms, look for items that will help you pass on. And do not forget to read the tips of the detective, for whom you play will periodically give out.

name: My Fair Cat: Snow
description: Dive into a feel-good adventure of love, laughter, and cat companionship. For anyone who has ever smiled at the thought of making a cat's day!

name: My Little RPG Shop
description: A 3D simulation maganement game

name: Necromantic
description: Start out as a lowly freshman at Valorborn Academy and prove yourself to the school and other students – or don’t, and repeatedly fall to the legions of horrors that await in Necromantic. Study up to survive in this dark and dangerous fantasy Bullet Heaven ... solo or by online co-op.

name: Neighbor's Wife
description: Your neighbor is always busy and doesn't have much time to spend with his wife, which makes her feel lonely and sad. You are the only one who can save their marriage!

name: Night at the Cabin
description: During an investigation in the wilderness, you stumble across a cabin in the middle of the woods. Trapped inside, you must survive for five nights until the police can get to your location, all while avoiding the mysterious "Widow of the Woods." For years she was thought to be a myth. Until now...

name: Nora: Forest Nights
description: Take control of our intrepid hero as you take Nora on a camping trip for the weekend. While on the trip, you'll convince Nora that it is of vital importance to follow certain, rules!

name: Norah's Song
description: Norah's Song: This first-person psychological horror plunges you into a nightmare. Immerse yourself in a haunting past, desperately seeking answers. Each discovery threatens your sanity, chilling you to the core. Can you survive the darkness long enough to find redemption?

name: Click To Eleven
description: Click button, get number, number good, win game when number is eleven

name: One: Secret Empire
description: Join Kain, Omega-7’s last survivor, uncovering secrets on an SCP Federation asteroid. Unravel the truth, endure chaos, and delve into a conspiracy that could reshape SCP history in this sci-fi thriller.

name: Oops! Zombie Swarm
description: An unknown virus has turned most people into zombies. In this disaster, you unexpectedly discover a mysterious dragon egg, which seems to grant you immunity to the virus. Now, your mission is to protect this precious dragon egg and ensure it is not destroyed by hordes of zombies.

name: Park Studio
description: Park Studio is a next-generation park building and simulation game that lets you create the park of your dreams with intricate details and next-level quality! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Photobia: Tales from the Dark
description: Immerse yourself in the dark and mysterious universe of Photobia: Tales from the Dark, where intricate light-based puzzles await. Use physics to overcome obstacles and bring light to the heart of this enigmatic world.

name: Poltergeist Watcher
description: Can you survive the night watching the cursed house?

name: HexaScape: Cyber Defense
description: Build your perfect defenses with hexagons! Use hex tiles to explore cyberspace, upgrade your defense towers, and complete quests in this unique turn-based strategy game. With a story campaign, a procedurally generated endless mode, and a powerful editor, HexaScape offers endless challenges.

name: Honey Bee
description: Your main mission is to explore a vibrant and lively scenario filled with beautiful flowers. As a skillful bee, your goal is to collect the nectar from these flowers. But wait, there must be more to it, right?

name: HyperPop
description: Living in a dystopian corporate world has driven R-054 (Rosa) to her limits. After having an altercation with the law, use your new cybernetic enchantments to run, jump, and grapple your way to freedom from the oppressive Corporatocracy. This game will challenge you to go faster than ever before!

name: Idle Taoist Mage Warrior 2
description: This is a well-built place hang-up RPG game, for players to bring fighters, mage, Taoist three career choices, each career has unique characteristics, so that players in the game to experience different combat pleasure.

name: Into the V.O.I.D.
description: Board your spaceship and delve Into the VOID, facing waves of relentless enemies. Grow stronger with each battle to overcome Zentharian commanders and their “Bullet-Hell” attack patterns. This top-down roguelike shooter promises short but intense runs where your wits and reflexes will be tested.

name: Iridescent
description: Embark on a perilous journey through a plagued empire! Explore a vast world, conquer intricate dungeons and hone your skills against relentless adversaries that stand in your way of finding a cure. Are you capable of seeing this adventure to its end?

name: Jitter
description: Jitter is an immersive sci-fi exploration and survival game set on a mining colony and its outskirts in the Main Asteroid Belt. You assume the role of an experimental AI that maintains ship functions and engages with the crew on board. As you explore the mining colony, you will take on new missions, expand ships and bases using various modules, add survivors to your crew, engage in space fights, and repair the damage left by enemy fire and onboard accidents.

name: Journey
description: Alone in the street, one destination, one goal. Can you save her family?

name: Keeper's Curse
description: Welcome to the mysterious and haunted island of “Keeper’s Curse”. In this action-packed survival third-person shooter, you’ll face relentless waves of cursed creatures while unraveling the secrets of the island and striving to escape its sinister grasp.

name: King of Hell
description: King of Hell is a 6-player, online, Arcade Party Game. You play against your friends in a arena filled with random Items and Jump'n Run obstacles. Try to knock your opponents into the lava to stash points and then climb up to the top platform, to score your points and become King of Hell!

name: Last Summer
description: Last Summer is a single-player third-person adventure set in the Lost Alpine Mountains, where you will go through the challenges of a young adult, turning into their own person. Climb, Explore and rediscovery what has been lost in the Lost Alpine.

name: Little Fire Girl Fights Final Boss
description: Engage in a thrilling fast-paced boss battle without the need of tedious grinding! Play as a little fire mage and invoke a combination of spells to defeat the final boss.

name: Legends of Aden
description: Legends of Aden is a Western fantasy style MMORPG featuring intense monster battles and treasure hunts, clan assemblies, field bosses, and thrilling PvP combat. With an open trading system driven by players, danger and opportunity coexist. Come gather wealth, make allies, and dominate the realm.

name: Boris and the Dark Survival: The Unleashed
description: Sin descripción

name: Exceed Gear
description: A 2D rogue-lite anime action game, focused on combos and freedom of expression. Build synergistic combos through mind-blowing modifiers and combat upgrades each run. Fight through hordes of Valkyries and become the savior of the E.X.C.E.E.D program!

name: Enough with the Witch
description: Destroy the evil witch that contaminated the region and cursed their happy habitants to convert them into horrible (but cute) monsters. This auto attacker with deck building mechanics to customize your character presents a casual game, frenetic and fun, full of magic and adventure.

name: DNA: Episode 5
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Defence of the Arcane Realms
description: A 3D tower defender where you must strategically use a combination of magical powers, traps, and towers in order to defend your castle against hordes of orcs, undead, and other unsavory sorts.

name: Deep Dish Dungeon
description: Co-op online multiplayer game where you must unite to survive the treacherous depths of a mysterious dungeon, navigate puzzling passageways and gather resources to improve your camping site. Encounter enemies with diverse behaviors, discover coveted treasures, and unravel enigmas within its depths.

name: DDI Touring Car Championship
description: Inspired by 90s classic arcade racing games DDI Touring Car Championship delivers super fast gameplay with a Hyper Techno soundtrack.

name: Drak(c)ula
description: Drak(c)ula is a typing game where you type the horror novel Dracula by Bram Stoker.

name: Ezerath 3D
description: The 3d remaster of Ezerath's Last Hope, featuring improved dungeons, more stats to upgrade your character with, and refined in-game systems!

name: Global Elite
description: Save the Earth from countless swarms of giant insects as a valiant member of the GLOBAL ELITE! Auto-battle your way to victory with a ragtag crew of survivors! Use every weapon at your disposal to crush those bugs and save humanity! Join the fight and become a member of the GLOBAL ELITE!

name: Grudge Murder: Flight
description: Grudge Murder - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: Haloo
description: Fight the endless mass of enemies, collect loot, get stronger and Haloo!

name: Hand of Seasons
description: Hand of Seasons is an otherworldly, card-based journey set in the nordic plains. You are The Apprentice. Traverse the winterclad wilds and bring back balance between the four seasons. Craft your deck, discover synergies, and find artifacts as you embark on this spellbinding adventure!

name: Atomite
description: Atomite is 30 levels of bright, cartoonish atom blasting 3D action; tens of thousands of atoms populate each level with their own unique properties. Search out the presents -- some which are booby-trapped -- to complete the level while avoiding varied enemies and environmental obstacles.

name: AquaBlitz: Alien Racer
description: Race against each other in 3 dimensions under water, choose to race as human, alien or atlantean. Choose and mod your racer with weapons. On the track find boosts and other items, avoid the obstacles, take shortcuts and shoot your way to be the first over the finishing line.

name: A Rite from the Stars: Remaster Edition
description: When the stars descend on Kaikala they choose a young boy to leave childhood behind and become a legend. It’s time for Kirm, a mute but skilled boy, to overcome the challenges that await in the wisdom, courage & spirit paths in this touching story with several endings!

name: Bagel Love Story
description: A light-hearted and enjoyable short romance VN! The protagonist, Fan Tong, struggles to lose weight in hopes of finding a job, but the journey is far from smooth. Until one day, a cute and sunny girl named Bagel comes into his life, kickstarting a story of weight loss, cross-dressing, and romance!

name: Chamber Survival
description: From a first person perspective, escape this terrifying room.

name: Chaos Brave Village
description: This game is a turn-based strategy adventure where you play as a king's trusted confidant sent to a remote village to investigate a mysterious power. Search for clues, recruit heroes, confront unknown enemies, and uncover the truth behind the "inaccessible place."

name: Chefcito Asesino
description: In this game, we embody an extremely angry rat that must defend itself from the sewer monsters to survive. We have a variety of weapons at our disposal to achieve this.

name: Clutter Puzzle Magazine: Vol. 16 No. 2 - Collector's Edition
description: Jam-packed with over 1,400 fun and challenging puzzles! Explore revamped Spot The Differences Puzzles, test your skills with Abstract Squares and Circle Puzzles, and relish timeless favorites such as Sliders, Square Jigsaws and Box Quotes.

name: Collectors Cove
description: Set sail on a cozy farming adventure aboard your boat in Collector's Cove. Explore diverse climate zones with your animal companion and discover a multitude of rare crops and fish. Enjoy cozy solitude while completing your Collector's compendium and rise to the rank of a Named Collector.

name: Cookard
description: Cookard is a cooking game where you run a restaurant by stacking cards to prepare and serve dishes to customers.

name: Cyyer
description: Face the horrors alone as you fight for survival in Cyyer

name: Synth Riders: A-ha - "Take On Me"
description: Add a-ha - "Take on Me" to your library!An evergreen New Wave hit, “Take On Me” packs the dance floor with infectious energy. Catchy riffs from swirling synths, topped by the stunning voice of Morten Harket as he hits that famous high note.

name: Synth Riders: Devo - "Whip It"
description: Add Devo - "Whip It" to your library!Put on your “energy dome” and venture into a beautiful world of de-evolution with Devo! These pioneers of US New Wave, have a satirical, nonsensical answer to all life's problems: just crack that whip!

name: Synth Riders: INXS - "New Sensation"
description: Add INXS - "New Sensation" to your library!Representing late 80s rock is Australia's INXS, featuring huge drums, trademark relentless guitars and a sax solo all alongside the distinctive vocals of charismatic front man Michael Hutchence

name: Synth Riders: Phil Collins - "Sussudio"
description: Add Phil Collins - "Sussudio" to your library!Take a nonsense word, a horn section and the heavy funk influence of “1999” by Prince, this mid-80s Phil Collins song about a schoolboy crush will leave you wanting to just say the word “Sussudio”!

name: Synth Riders: Starship - "We Built This City"
description: Add Starship - "We Built this City" to your library!We just want to dance here, but someone stole the stage! A protest song against the closure of live music venues in Los Angeles, Starship celebrates music as the city's true cultural foundation.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KIAH Airport
description: George Bush Intercontinental Houston Airport (ICAO: KIAH, IATA: IAH) is an international airport that serves the greater Houston area and ranks as 'Best U.S. Airport'. It will be easily one of the best add-on also In Tower! Simulator 3.

name: The Zombie Wave: DLC
description: Zombie Wave is a 3D shooting survival Roguelike game.

name: The Crew Motorfest: Year 1 Pass
description: Upgrade your garage with the Year 1 Pass and obtain 25 vehicles throughout Year 1!

name: Magic Farm
description: Magic Farm is a simple and short bullet hell

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Kohana
description: Chasing bad guys, investigating crimes, helping citizens, and lots of paperwork! Just another day in the life of a city police officer.

name: A.V.A Global: Masters Pack
description: Receive 1 Unique Soldier Box Unlock 3 character skins: Marek Camo, Sailor Lili, Requiem Priest Get a pack of 300 Mod Tickets Obtain 2,500 Medals

name: South Park: Snow Day! - 420 Pack
description: Celebrate 420 with new cosmetic items for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! Featuring cool outfit items for your New Kid.

name: Boris and the Dark Survival: Symphony of Shadows
description: The mad maestro returns

name: Mini Maze: Online
description: Welcome to Mini Maze, the ultimate online maze challenge! Navigate through intricate mazes to outsmart your opponents and reach the goal first. Connect with friends, customize your avatar, and immerse yourself in this thrilling strategic adventure. Download Mini Maze now and test your skills against players from all over the world!

name: Salvatorem
description: Fight Slavic mythological bosses in this closed-world RPG

name: Postal F: The Thursday Expansion - A Mod for Friday Night Funkin'.
description:
After the events of the first week, the dude sees himself encountering a familiar face: Krotchy! Go up against Krotchy in a new nutsack wrenchin' week, along with another song we can't seem to figure out!

Boyfriend seems to have found himself in a sticky situation when he enters the wrong side of town...

Postal F: Apocalypse Friday is a mod based around the Postal franchise, created by Running with Scissors Studios. In this mod, you go against the infamous "Postal Dude" in a 2 song mania featuring Boyfriend and a familiar Redhead. Will you survive or regret your decision? On behalf of the mod team, we all hope you have an enjoyable experience. This mod started out simply as only a cover but evolved into a 2 month long passion project.

name: The Tale of Marena's Deft
description: You are Marena, the spirit of death. You have spent many nights chasing a demon-queen Dukljana the Deathless, climbing to the very heights of Mount Troyan. If you can't stop her, she will steal the sun itself and who knows what will happen to the world then! Inspired by Touhou games (especially the early ones) and Slavic folk mythology.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Gorefield
description: After 2 long years, the story of Jon and Bf vs. Gorefield continues, with better quality and content. An adventure full of terrors and enigmas awaits you, a renewed mod that quadruples the content of the first version!

name: The Kotchei
description: In the Kotchei you play as a undead lord risen from the dead to destroy the Order, an evil theocracy. Craft spells and powerful items, summon minions to fight alongside you, build up your keep and rob graves for more material for your research.

name: Regular Friday Night
description:
Just a Regular Friday.... Right?

Boyfriend and Girlfriend need to make some money to buy more condoms, so they see a help wanted poster for a near by park and decide to take the job!!

But... things get a bit messy..

name: Bylina: Lure of the Sorceress
description: Gather your party, and venture forth to the Kholodny Bay! Explore the wide open wilderness and dozens of dastardly dungeon levels, face hundreds of different monsters inspired by slavic mythology, and have fun storming the castle of the evil Sorceress!

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Homr
description:
This is the VS HOMR mod.

Yeah, not so dumb, a full week and 3 songs in freeplay

Idk

Cool songs I think

name: Funkin' at Freddy's + Afton Full Week
description: Funkin' at Freddy's is a mod we've made with a lot of passion and respect to the original series of Five Nights at Freddy's and contains 10 songs in its base-release, with six of these songs are unlocked through various means with varying visuals. If you get stuck with trying to figure out how to unlock characters take a peek at the strategy guide image that's included in the files.

name: Bad Time Simulator (Sans Fight)
description: A port of the Sans battle from Undertale to web browser.

name: Runaway Girl: Picked up a Girl
description:
Living together with an obsessive lover runaway girl
A moving story begins──
You can find a runaway girl and change her life. An adventure to nurture bonds and overcome difficulties awaits. Her future is in your hands.
Let's take the hand of a runaway girl who is at a loss and open up a new path. Her destiny depends on your choices. Her emotional journey begins—your kindness and her courage will help her save her life.

name: Bubblets
description: The game-board consists of a screen of differently-colored balls arranged in a matrix. There are five different colors: red, blue, green, yellow and purple. The player then clicks on any two or more connecting similarly-colored balls to eliminate them from the matrix, earning an appropriate number of points in the process. The more balls eliminated at once, the higher the points added to the player's score.

name: Imperium Universalis
description: Imperium Universalis is a total conversion mod for Europa Universalis IV. The mod spans from the Age of Empires, starting from the 10th of August 142 AUC (612 BCE), through the Archaic Period, the Classical Period, the Early Hellenistic Period, the Late Hellenistic Period, the Imperial Period to end in Early Migration Period 1127 AUC (374 CE).

name: Anbennar
description: Anbennar is set in an fantasy world evoking themes from D&D, but through lens and time period of a strategy game like EU4. See how a fantasy world changes from an age of adventurers and good vs. evil to an age of gunpowder, colonialism and magical decadence.

name: Microsoft Minesweeper
description: A port of Microsoft Minesweeper for Windows Mobile.

name: Satan is an Astronaut
description: A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.

name: Microsoft Solitaire
description: A port of Microsoft Solitaire included in Windows Mobile.

name: Internet Hearts
description: Internet Hearts is a game pre-installed on Windows ME and Windows XP systems that features online play.

name: Ostrov Sokrovishch
description: Sin descripción

name: Internet Spades
description: A remake of Internet Spades included in Windows 7.

name: Internet Checkers
description: A remake of Internet Checkers included in Windows 7.

name: Internet Backgammon
description: A remake of Internet Backgammon included in Windows 7.

name: Microsoft Squares
description: The objective of the game is to connect the dots in order to complete squares. The player with the most squares when the board is filled wins the game.

name: Kita no Chi to Hitori no Shoujo: Koropokkuru no Negai
description:
Marimo Kushiro was about to go home as usual.
There, she meets Kororu, a being known as an ayakashi.
It seems that Koror has a request for Mai Suzumo.
His wish was, ``I want you to defeat the bear demon.''
Mai Suzumo takes the amulet (ofuda) and stands up to make Kororu's wish come true.
--This is a story set in Hokkaido.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator
description: The Macintosh version featured pull-down menus and multiple view windows for the cockpit, spot plane, map, and control tower.

name: Crazy Kart 2
description:
This is an online racing car game that has become popular in China, Hong Kong, India, the Philippines, Thailand, and Vietnam. In the Philippines, this game is the largest casual online game with a following exceeding 1 million players.

In this game, players compete with millions of others from all over Indonesia. Crazy Kart offers various racing tracks and diverse vehicle types. Using cute characters, gamers can select fantasy tracks such as outer space, fairy cities, or modern roads like those in China, America, or Formula 1 races. Crazy Kart also provides hundreds of types of cars to choose from, ranging from sedans, jeeps, buses, trucks, race cars, SUVs, and other cool cars. This game was officially accessible starting from April 2009.

name: Anomaly Investigations
description: It's a game that's inspired by The Exit 8 which is an evolution of games like Observation Duty. It's a little atmospheric and creepy, but not too scary. You need to traverse the location and remember how things were, each loop through the location, things can change. Sometimes the change is super obvious, sometimes super subtle. Sometimes there's no change at all!

name: La Caja de los Sueños
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace VR Shooting
description:
Experience shooting like never before.

Ace combines cutting-edge Virtual Reality with a stunningly realistic handset to transform your shooting.

name: 31 Minutos The Game
description: a WarioWare inspired game for mobile.

name: Milano'd
description: Milano’d an interactive, text-based game that plunges players into the murky depths of corporate intrigue at a multinational corporation known for its glamorous facade and secretive dealings. As the newest employee, you are thrust into the annual Mega Raffle, an event surrounded by rumors of corruption and manipulation. Navigate through a web of deceit as you decide whether to expose the wrongdoing, exploit it for personal gain, or simply try to survive your day-to-day corporate life. Your choices will lead you through conversations with allies and adversaries alike, uncovering secrets that could alter the course of your career and the integrity of MilanoCorp. Each decision shapes the narrative, leading to multiple outcomes based on your moral compass and strategic cunning. Can you unravel the truth without losing yourself in the process?

name: LostMiner: Build & Craft Game
description:
Open world game with mining, crafting and exploration elements. It has a side view camera, combining 2D and 3D effects, with refined pixel graphics!
You can do anything you want in a fully destructible, pixel-generated, procedurally generated world, with many different biomes and secrets!
Place and break blocks, build a house, a crop plantation, an animal farm, cut down trees, create new items, gather resources, go fishing, ride an ostrich, milk cows, face monsters, dig and explore the secrets of a random underground place, try to survive! The deeper you go, the harder it will be! The game has creative and survival modes, offline (you can play without WiFi), but supports local multiplayer.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Invitation to the Mad Banquet
description:
Version 7.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 2: The Seven Shus in the Maze
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Mad Pleasure: Shadowbringer (Thelema)
• New Featured Event: Flying to Oxia Invitation Contest
• ...and more!
